message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 3-9-2, translated into all languages

data.en: The World Health Organization (WHO) is the Custodian Agency or co-Custodian Agency for reporting on several SDG indicators, including indicator 3.9.2, the mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services).
